description: This file defines routing logic for a Flutter application, mapping route names to corresponding screen widgets, and handling unknown routes by displaying a not found page.

classes.name: AppRoutes
classes.description: Defines route names and the route generation logic for navigation throughout the app.

classes.name: _NotFoundPage
classes.description: A stateless widget displaying a 'Page not found' message for unknown routes.

methods.name: AppRoutes.onGenerateRoute
methods.description: Generates a page route based on the given route settings, mapping route names to screens.

methods.name: _NotFoundPage.build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the not found page.
